tree.name: Jarred Vanderbilt
tree.tradeDescription: 3-team trade: Lakers acquired Vanderbilt, Malik Beasley from Jazz and D'Angelo Russell from Timberwolves; sent Westbrook, Damian Jones, Juan Toscano-Anderson, 2027 1st to Jazz; sent 2024 2nd to Timberwolves
tree.note: Forward known for defense and rebounding

assetsGivenUp.name: Russell Westbrook
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: 5-team trade: Lakers acquired Westbrook from Wizards, sent Kuzma, KCP, Harrell to Wizards and Isaiah Jackson to Pacers
assetsGivenUp.note: Former MVP, traded from Washington Wizards to Lakers

assetsGivenUp.name: Kyle Kuzma
assetsGivenUp.note: Utah forward, drafted 27th overall by Lakers

assetsGivenUp.name: Kentavious Caldwell-Pope
assetsGivenUp.note: Guard signed as free agent by Lakers from Pistons

assetsGivenUp.name: Montrezl Harrell
assetsGivenUp.note: Center signed as free agent by Lakers from Clippers

assetsGivenUp.name: 2021 LAL 1st Round Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: Lakers' own 1st round pick, became #22 overall, sent to Pacers

assetsGivenUp.name: Damian Jones
assetsGivenUp.note: Center signed multi-year deal with Lakers as free agent in 2022

assetsGivenUp.name: Juan Toscano-Anderson
assetsGivenUp.note: Forward signed with Lakers as free agent from Warriors in 2022

assetsGivenUp.name: 2027 LAL 1st Round Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: Lakers' own 1st round pick, sent to Utah Jazz

assetsGivenUp.name: 2024 2nd Round Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: Least favorable 2nd round pick, sent to Minnesota Timberwolves
